#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<strstream>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
inline int getn()
{
register int n=0,
    c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}
int main()
{
    int t,no,x,y,m,n,sum;
    t=getn();
    while(t--)
    {
        sum=0;
        no=getn();x=getn();y=getn();
        while(no--)
        {
            m=getn();n=getn();
            sum=sum+abs(x-m)+abs(y-n);
        }
        sum=sum*2;
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
    
    return 0;
}
